ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(3) > section > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(1) > article:nth-child(1) > h5:nth-child(1)

html > body > footer:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(2) > section:nth-child(1) > article:nth-child(5) > h5:nth-child(1)
